mapper.sql: A.id AS id,A.higher_id AS higherId,A.area_name AS areaName,A.area_pinyin AS areaPinyin,A.area_pinyin_head AS areaPinyinHead,A.area_short_name AS areaShortName,A.level_id AS levelId,A.serial AS serial,A.type_id AS typeId,A.link_id AS linkId,A.group_id AS groupId,A.grade_id AS gradeId,A.main_status AS mainStatus,A.logic_status AS logicStatus,A.attr_decimal AS attrDecimal,A.attr_str AS attrStr,A.attr_int AS attrInt,A.sequence AS sequence,A.remark AS remark,A.deleted_at AS deletedAt,A.deleted_by AS deletedBy,A.created_at AS createdAt,A.created_by AS createdBy,A.updated_at AS updatedAt,A.updated_by AS updatedBy
LEFT JOIN province_city_area pca ON A.higher_id = pca.id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM A
WHERE A.serial = #{serial,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT 0,1
